Summary: Delicious sunflower nuts, I mix the Honey Roasted with the Unsalted
Text:
Delicious sunflower nuts, I mix the Honey Roasted with the Unsalted

I have tried most of the varieties of Good Sense Sunflower Nuts, and have enjoyed them all. My two favorites--so far--are the Honey Roasted & Unsalted. But I have found that a 50/50 mix of these two varieties is what I enjoy most. The mixture is the just right compromise.
